content: p2 fc3 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 33 - 40 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 41 *fc5 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 42 - 47 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round tttiiimmmeee tttooo dddeeecccrrreeeaaassseee **note** you may want to switch to using dpns or the magic loop method from this point on round 48 *k2tog k6 k2tog p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round 90 sts round 49 *k2tog k4 k2tog p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round 80 sts round 50 *k2tog k2 k2tog p2 repeat from * until end of round 60 sts round 51 *k2tog twice p2 repeat from * until end of round 40 sts round 52 *k2tog p2tog repeat from * until end of round 20 sts you may now skip to the finishing off section at the end of this pattern ccchhhiiilllddd sssiiizzzeee iiinnnssstttrrruuuccctttiiiooonnnsss cast on 90 sts and join to work in the round place a stitch marker here to mark the beginning of the round if you like you will have 90 sts in each round of this project until you reach the decrease section to form the twisted rib brim *kbl1 p1 and repeat from * for 7 rounds rounds 1 -
